130.reason: Fixed in CLI 2.1.7, no longer relevant

122.title: SDK MCP servers fail to connect from concurrent query() calls - 60s timeout
122.reason: Confirmed bug affecting concurrent usage, clear workaround available

121.title: Missing @anthropic-ai/sdk dependency causes types to resolve as any

115.title: allowedTools does not restrict built-in tools - security issue for read-only agents
115.reason: User error - bypassPermissions disables allowedTools. Added rule to prevent misuse

106.title: SDK Should Throw Error Instead of Exiting with Code 1 on Long Input
106.reason: Common production pain point, workaround via debug option

129.title: Ripgrep binary lacks execute permission on Remote SSH (VSIX doesn't preserve Unix permissions)
129.reason: VS Code extension developers hit this, clear workaround available

118.title: MCP tool calls timeout at 5 minutes due to undici headersTimeout despite MCP_TOOL_TIMEOUT=1200000 (20 minutes)
118.reason: Confirmed bug blocking long-running MCP tools, no workaround
